description:
Non-material amendment to allow the following changes:
Construction System amendment - from traditional build system to Byldis system.  Rustication added to the Ground and First Floor Eastern and Southern fa?ade. Amendment to the colour of window frames on Ground and First Floor. Louvres added to Block I ground floor fa?ade to provide sufficient free area for ventilation. Feature metal I beam to the ground and first floor opening surround replaced with green glazed brick. Block K Ground floor south-east fa?ade changed from 2 bays to 3 bays. Pedestrians ramp for access to ground floor car park has been added to the eastern fa?ade. Relocation of external bike racks from the area adjacent to the car park entrance to the external area of commercial unit 1.Ground floor internal layout updated to address fire consultant?s comments. Building repositioned to maintain required distance to Network Rail boundary. Landscaping at ground level updated to suit current building design. Following planning permission 00703/A/P20 dated 3/12/2018   for all reserved matters (appearance, access, layout, scale and landscaping) in respect of the Capital Court residential phase comprising of 253 units and 208 spm commercial uses (A1, A2, A3, A4, A5, B1, D1 and D2 uses)
